name: Greyie's journey
description:
Your name is greyie.

You've been disassociated in two beings, one white and one black.

You'll be trying everything you can to reform yourself, even if it involves touching strange floating shards.

The rest of your mission is simple :

  • Build your path (changing as few as possible)
  • Experiment with the synchronized characters
  • Complete the 7 levels
  • Have fun

Oh and by the way, there is no gray, just a semi-transparent layer of white on a layer of black. : )

This game was made for the "Black and White Jam №∞" (hosted by MYline media)

It was made using the Olc::PixelGameEngine.
